name: Swipa: Control it!
description:
Swipa it´s the new game created by Freakin Games in which you must control one of the players aviable to play an try to not touch the bars or you will fail be careful the game is complicated you control the player with the phone by using accelerometer. Every character has its own type of cash for example default player are simple coins, dog has a bone, a chicken thigh, bee has the honey, etc...

Some of it´s features are:

-A bunch of players for Playe with him
-Every character has it´s own type of coin
-The use of accelerometer as a controller
-One tap game or better dual-side game
-Leaderboards with your friends
-Achivements for improve your addiction
-And a lot of more...
